## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 12,000                                   |
| Rationale                         | Ensure sufficient inventory to cover forecasted demand and potential variability for the next 5 days, while considering lead time and current stock levels. This order size avoids unnecessary surplus while also reducing the risk of stockouts. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Higher than Player's planned order quantity to increase coverage and reduce risk of stockouts. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | ~7 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                     |
| Comments                          | Ordering 12,000 units allows for a buffer to account for fluctuations in demand and ensures sufficient stock to meet predicted sales. This approach also helps improve stock turnover by preventing excessive inventory buildup.  |
